channel.title: utilities on jamesm.blog
channel.description: Recent content in utilities on jamesm.blog

item.title: Mac Utilities
item.description: Alfred - award-winning app for macOS which boosts your efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more Amphetamine - powerful keep-awake utility CleanMyMac - cleanup utility for macOS CleanShot - capture your Mac’s screen like a pro DirEqual - compare folders DiskCatalogMaker - catalog all your discs Disk Space Analyzer Pro - analyze & cleanup disk space FileZilla - FTP, FTPS & SFTP client GitKraken - powerful suite of Git tools Google Drive - cloud storage iTerm2 - terminal emulator Kaleidoscope - spot the differences in text and image files, or even folders full of files LastPass - password manager Loom - screen recorder NordPVN - VPN Notion - single space where you can think, write, and plan OmniPlayer Pro - play or cast video audio media OneDrive - cloud storage Parallels - add Windows, Linux, or another operating system to your Mac Pure Paste - paste as plain text by default Slack - messaging app The Unarchiver - open any type of archive file
item.content:encoded:
• Alfred - award-winning app for macOS which boosts your efficiency with hotkeys, keywords, text expansion and more
  • Amphetamine - powerful keep-awake utility
  • CleanMyMac - cleanup utility for macOS
  • CleanShot - capture your Mac’s screen like a pro
  • DirEqual - compare folders
  • DiskCatalogMaker - catalog all your discs
  • Disk Space Analyzer Pro - analyze & cleanup disk space
  • FileZilla - FTP, FTPS & SFTP client
  • GitKraken - powerful suite of Git tools
  • Google Drive - cloud storage
  • iTerm2 - terminal emulator
  • Kaleidoscope - spot the differences in text and image files, or even folders full of files
  • LastPass - password manager
  • Loom - screen recorder
  • NordPVN - VPN
  • Notion - single space where you can think, write, and plan
  • OmniPlayer Pro - play or cast video audio media
  • OneDrive - cloud storage
  • Parallels - add Windows, Linux, or another operating system to your Mac
  • Pure Paste - paste as plain text by default
  • Slack - messaging app
  • The Unarchiver - open any type of archive file
